title: Dr. Slump Movie 06: Arale-chan N-cha! Penguin Mura wa Hare Nochi Hare

synonyms: Dr. Slump: Arale-chan - Ncha! Penguin Mura wa Hare Nochi Hare
alternative_titles.en: Dr. Slump and Arale-chan: N-cha! Clear Skies Over Penguin Village
alternative_titles.ja: Dr.スランプ アラレちゃん んちゃ!ペンギン村はハレのち晴れ

synopsis:
At the Penguin Village, the dinosaurs styled monster named Dodongadon appeared. But he was small as Arale and did not have strong power. Arale defeat him very easily, and Dodongadon called his mother Mamangadon. She was huge and had a big power. How Arale can defeat this big monster?

(Source: Official Website)
